cf.lukasheinzl.syntax

Class WordFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cf.lukasheinzl.syntax.Formatter
      • cf.lukasheinzl.syntax.WordFormatter

  • public class WordFormatter
extends Formatter
    This class is a subclass of Formatter and is used for formats that only apply to a single token.
    Author:
    Lukas Heinzl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordFormatter(Format startFmt, Format endFmt)
      Constructs a WordFormatter with the given formats

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.lang.String process(Token input)
      Processes the input token and applies the correct format, if any, to it
